Text: Grill, check. Fryer, check. Fire source...check.

I've finished closing up. It's hard to get used to
things, since it's been a while.
Great job, Lady Alpha.
...Heheh.
What? Did you remember something funny?

No, it's just hard to believe that the leader of the
Shadow Garden is working the stall here at Tuna
King.

I doubt any living soul would suspect a thing...
That thought got me laughing.

Well, for your part, you've gained recognition as the
president and face of Luna, Ltd.

Looking in from the outside, I'm just a humble
elf of unknown origins working for Luna, Ltd.
Now you're just being silly...

All jokes aside, this store's influx of customers and
sales is palpable even without confirming the
numbers.

Our business hours are five to ten in the morning.
The menu is limited to four different sets, and we
only allow takeout...

In the downtown area of Midgar Kingdom, you wouldn't
expect a business like this to generate significant sales.

But certain "exceptions" occur here in the Sacred
Land of Lindwurm, notably in this sector with its
churches and temples.

I was surprised by the sight of all the workers—those
who clean and deliver essentials for the Church's
facilities—gathering here at this stall after a night's
work.

It also surprised me how few places there were for
them to get a hot meal every day after work due to
their working hours.

The clergymen of Lindwurm extend their hands to those
who rely on the teachings of the Church...at least that's
their official stance.

But the same can't be said for how they treat the
workers who tend to the spaces where they preach
their doctrines.

This stall serves as a gathering place for the likes
of them, and if you listen to their conversations,
you can glean nuggets of intel.

...Such as the existence of the Sanctuary you
previously brought up in your report.

It's a rumor amongst workers, lacking in credibility,
but the rumor extends to those going in and out of
the Church's institutions daily. It may be worth
investigating to see if it contains any truth.

...Your intuition as a businesswoman is proving
useful even for espionage. If this leads to any
new discoveries, you ought to praise yourself,
Gamma.

If I'm being honest, establishing a Tuna King stall
here was quite the adventure for me.

We had the data proving it would be profitable, but I
still felt like we were entering uncharted waters. When
I took the plunge, I wasn't sure we could achieve the
results I had envisioned.

Really? I agreed to the proposal because I was sure
something would come of a project you had taken
your time to plan.
You place a lot of faith in me, Lady Alpha!

When it comes to developing the Garden, I'll always
be there to support any of you when you need my help.

Speaking of which, your previous proposal to set up
a new head office for Luna, Ltd. in the center of the
capital... I think it's time we finally move forward with
it. What do you think?
Oh! Lady Alpha...!

This means further selling you as the face of Luna.
You'll likely acquire other enemies besides the Cult
which may limit your movement.

But, as you know, there's no better time than now
to expand the business, especially with Luna, Ltd.
gaining in popularity.
You're counting on me...! I will not let you down!!!

"Those who know themselves to be the weakest are wise
enough to find the path to becoming the strongest!"

Those are the wise words our lord once imparted to
me. I will continue following the path of "Gamma the
Weak"!
